text: Jemima Shore is a fictional character created by Antonia Fraser. She is portrayed as TV's professional investigative journalist. She is in a series of crime novels. == Novels == * Quiet as a Nun (1977) * The Wild Island (1978) * A Splash of Red (1981) * Cool Repentance (1982) * Oxford Blood (1985) * Jemima Shore's First Case (1986) * Your Royal Hostage (1987) * The Cavalier Case (1990) * Jemima Shore at the Sunny Grave (1991) * Political Death (1995) == Television == Shore has also been the basis of two television series which aired in the UK: the 1978 Armchair Thriller serial Quiet as a Nun with Maria Aitken as Jemima Shore, and an ongoing series, Jemima Shore Investigates, starring Patricia Hodge in the title role. The series was made by Thames Television for the ITV network in 1983. One series of twelve episodes was made. ==Other websites== * Category:Fictional British people Category:English- language television programs
